column22: To the Shareholder of Merck Life Science A/S (former Millipore A/S)
column27: The annual report has been prepared in accordance with the Danish Financial Statements Act.
column28: It is our opinion that the financial statements give a true and fair view of the Company's assets, liabilities and financial position at 31 December 2014 and of the result of the Company's operations  for the year 1 January - 31 December 2014.
column33: Proposed dividends are recognised as a liability at the date when they are adopted at the annual general meeting (declaration date). The expected dividend payment for the year is disclosed as a separate item under equity.
column34: Staff expenses comprise wages and salaries as well as payroll expenses.
column35: Interest income and interest expenses comprise interest income and expense, gains and losses on payables and transactions denominated in foreign currencies, amortisation of financial assets and liabilities as well as surcharges and refunds under the on-account tax scheme. etc.
column36: Financial liabilities are measured at amortised cost. Other liabilities are measured at net realisable value.
column37: Other external expenses comprise expenses incurred for travelling, administration and other external expenses.
column38: Receivables are measured at amortised cost. Provision is made for anticipated losses at net realisable value.
